document_data.name: Sauk
document_data.mainbody: '''Sauk''' was a [[Malarite]] hunter,{{cite book/Sentinelspire||5}} and one of the [[Blades of the Old Man]].{{cite book/Sentinelspire||3}} He was a part of the team that went to look for [[Kheil]] and secure the ''[[Erael'len]]'' in the Northern [[Shalhoond]], conspiring to kill the [[Chereth|Old Man of the Mountain]].{{cite book/Sentinelspire||4}}
document_data.Appearance: Sauk was a full head taller than [[Berun]], and well muscled.{{cite book/Sentinelspire||14}}{{cite book/Sentinelspire||41}}
document_data.Personality: Sauk was violent and cunning, but loyal to a fault, tolerating otherwise impossible annoyances and resistance from Kheil.
document_data.Relationships: Sauk considered [[Kheil]] to be closer than a brother, and even cut one ''[[luzal unba]]'' for him when he thought him dead. He considered only Talieth to be more powerful than he was. His ''arumwon'', or animal companion, was a [[tiger]] named [[Taaki]].
